PlaneÂ¶

class Plane

Represents a plane perpendicular to the xy-plane.

Public Functions

Plane(const double A, const double B, const double C, const short int id = 0)

Constructor.

Parameters
  • id -

    the surface id

  • A -

    the first coefficient in

  • B -

    the second coefficient in

  • C -

    the third coefficient in

double getXMin()

Returns the minimum x value of -INFINITY on this surface.

Return
the minimum x value of -INFINITY

double getXMax()

Returns the maximum x value of INFINITY on this surface.

Return
the maximum x value of INFINITY

double getYMin()

Returns the minimum y value of -INFINITY on this surface.

Return
the minimum y value of -INFINITY

double getYMax()

Returns the maximum y value of INFINITY on this surface.

Return
the maximum y value of INFINITY

double evaluate(const Point * point)

Evaluate a point using the plane’s quadratic surface equation.

Return
the value of point in the plane’s quadratic equation
Parameters
  • point -

    a pointer to the point of interest

int intersection(Point * point, double angle, Point * points)

Finds the intersection point with this plane from a given point and trajectory defined by an angle.

Return
the number of intersection points (0 or 1)
Parameters
  • point -

    pointer to the point of interest

  • angle -

    the angle defining the trajectory in radians

  • points -

    pointer to a point to store the intersection point

std::string toString()

Converts this plane’s attributes to a character array.

The character array returned conatins the type of plane (ie, PLANE) and the A, B, and C coefficients in the quadratic surface equation.

Return
a character array of this plane’s attributes

void printString()

Prints a string representation of all of the plane’s objects to the console.
